settings.text: The slopes are calling! Sign up to win a 2-night stay at Hotel Jerome + ski lift tickets!
Men's Styles | Women's Styles | Best Sellers | Our Story

NO PURCHASE NECESSARY. Complete the form above between October 29th and November 12th to be entered to win a 2-night stay at Hotel Jerome in Aspen, Colorado + 2 ski lift tickets + $500 Shopping Spree at The Normal Brand Denver. Submitting your email opts you in to marketing & promotional emails from The Normal Brand.

ELIGIBILITY: Must be eighteen 18 or older to enter. This Giveaway is open only to individuals who are residents of the United States of America and the District of Columbia.

WINNER NOTIFICATION: Deadline extended! Winner will be chosen at random on November 13th. Winner will be notified via email.

CONDITIONS: Prizes are non-transferable. No cash redemption or substitution will be allowed. By entering the sweepstakes, I agree to sign up to receive newsletters and special offers from thenormalbrand.com. The sweepstakes is subject to federal, state, municipal, and local laws and regulations and is void where prohibited. For more details see GIVEAWAY RULES below.
Started in their parents' basement in 2015, The Normal Brand is owned by 3 brothers that want to make Normal clothes, better. Comfortable, durable, and versatile. Normal should feel better.

settings.title: ★★★★★ Joe V.
settings.text: "This shirt is the perfect combination of stretch, softness, breathability, and a comfortable everyday fit. It’s a must-have!"

settings.title: ★★★★★ Alyx B.
settings.text: "Fabric is a dream, bought it for my husband but may steal it for myself...."

settings.title: ★★★★★ David B.
settings.text: "My father in law is tricky to shop for and notoriously picky about fit and comfort. I bought him one of these in Navy. It immediately became his favorite shirt."

settings.title: Comfortable, Sharp Outfits Ready for Fall

settings.text: We're brothers obessed with making Normal clothes better. Inspired by our grandfather's and dad's love for clothing, we grew up believing that the way you dress is a sign of respect to yourself and the people you meet with. We are dedicated to making the best product out there. We will always cater to you because we are you. We don't come with a designer agenda. We want Normal clothes to be better.

settings.title: Best Sellers People are Talking About

settings.heading: It All Started in a Basement

settings.text: Jimmy worked in finance and hated it. He loved one shirt he made – the first Normal shirt. Insanely comfortable, durable, and versatile. He quit his job and moved into our parents’ basement to work on it full time. People loved them.

Lan joined that summer after he graduated from college while he was interviewing for "real jobs." He was about to leave for Chicago when Jimmy called our dad and begged him to let him stay. Thank God he did and we started selling to retailers.

Conrad joined full time after law school and working for the Attorney General's office. He had been with us since the beginning at trade shows and every other event, but now it was official. Our website got much better and we opened a store.

We had always wanted a store of our own, and finally got it done in 2019. Our mom designed every last inch of the space. The brothers wanted one thing and got it - a bar. It felt like a dream had finally come to life to be able to experience the brand in a physical space. Now we have 11 stores across the country with more on the horizon!

We officed in the same not-that-great place for 7 years until one night a fire in the restaurant below us torched everything. Nothing like a little adversity to get the blood pumping. Everyone was safe thank God.

NO PURCHASE OR PAYMENT NECESSARY TO ENTER OR TO WIN. A PURCHASE WILL NOT IMPROVE YOUR CHANCES OF WINNING. ALL U.S. FEDERAL, STATE, LOCAL AND MUNICIPAL LAWS AND REGULATIONS APPLY. VOID WHERE PROHIBITED

GENERAL TERMS & CONDITIONS: The Normal Brand (the “Sponsor”) may post sweepstakes, giveaways, contests and other promotions (each a “Sweepstakes”) from time to time on social media, through its websites, including without limitation www.thenormalbrand.com and/or its retail stores. By entering a Sweepstakes, you agree to abide by the terms of these Official Rules (“Official Rules”) and by the decisions of the Sponsor, which are final and binding on all matters pertaining to a Sweepstakes. Unless specifically stated otherwise, our Sweepstakes are in no way sponsored, endorsed, administered by, or associated with Instagram, Facebook, Pinterest, Twitter, or any other social media platform, prize provider or organization not specifically named as a Sponsor in these Official Rules. Wireless Internet access fees and other charges imposed by your wireless carrier are your sole responsibility. The Sweepstakes may not be compatible with all mobile devices; wireless Internet access service may not be available in all areas.

SWEEPSTAKES DETAILS: To enter any Sweepstakes, follow the entry instructions posted on Sponsor’s social media channel, website or in its stores for the particular Sweepstakes (“Sweepstakes Description Page”). The entry period and prize description and value for a particular Sweepstakes will be listed on the Sweepstakes Description Page for that particular Sweepstakes; the Sweepstakes Description Page is made a part of these Official Rules and incorporated herein by reference; should there be any inconsistency between these Official Rules and the Sweepstakes Description Page, these Official Rules shall govern (except as specifically set forth herein). All dates are subject to change. Sponsor's clock is the official timekeeping device for all Sweepstakes. The entry must fulfill all sweepstakes requirements, as specified, to be eligible to win a prize. Entries that are not complete or do not adhere to the rules or specifications may be disqualified at the sole discretion of Sponsor. Unless otherwise indicated in the Sweepstakes Description Page (which shall control for purposes of number of entries allowed), you may enter only once and any attempt to enter more times than indicated by using multiple email addresses, identities or devices in an attempt to circumvent the rules is void and will result in disqualification.

PRIZE: Actual/appraised value may differ at time of prize award. The difference in value of a prize as stated in the Sweepstakes Description Page and the value at time of prize notification, if any, will not be awarded. Sponsor reserves the right to substitute a prize of equal or greater value. The specifics of the prize shall be solely determined by the Sponsor. If any element of prize is forfeited, no alternate prize or compensation will be awarded. Prize is non-transferable and does not include travel unless otherwise stated in Sweepstakes Description Page. Any and all prize related expenses, including without limitation any and all federal, state, and/or local taxes shall be the sole responsibility of the winner. No substitution of prize or transfer/assignment of prize to others or request for the cash equivalent by winners is permitted except at Sponsor’s sole discretion.

ELIGIBILITY: Sweepstakes are only open to residents of the 50 United States or the District of Columbia who are at least 18 years of age at the date of entry.

YOUR ENTRY INTO A SWEEPSTAKES WILL BE DEEMED TO BE A REPRESENTATION THAT YOU ARE 18 YEARS OF AGE AND AGREE TO BE BOUND BY THESE RULES.
Employees of the Sponsor, prize providers, as well as their immediate family members and/or persons living in their households; as well as all of the Sponsor’s agents, affiliates, resellers, subsidiaries, divisions, advertising and Sweepstakes agencies, and other entities in any way involved in production/distribution/administration of the Sweepstakes are not eligible to participate in any Sweepstakes.

PUBLICITY: If an entry is chosen by Sponsor as a Sweepstakes winner, each winning entrant expressly consents (where legal) to the use by Sponsor (without further permission or financial compensation) of such winner’s name and/or likeness, in any medium (including without limitation digital or hard copy), for publicity purposes in connection with the Sweepstakes, for marketing and advertising purposes or for any other purpose that is not prohibited by law. By submitting content as an entry in a Sweepstakes, you understand that Sponsor or anyone acting on behalf of Sponsor, or its respective licensees, successors and assigns will have the right, where permitted by law, without any further notice, review or consent to print, publish, broadcast, distribute, and use, worldwide in any media now known or hereafter in perpetuity and throughout the world, your entry, including, without limitation, the entry and winner's name, portrait, picture, voice, likeness, image or statements about the Sweepstakes, and biographical information as news, publicity or information and for trade, advertising, public relations and promotional purposes without any compensation.

ODDS OF WINNING; WINNER NOTIFICATION: Sweepstakes winners will be selected by random draw. Actual odds of winning a particular sweepstakes depend on the number of eligible entries received. Potential Winners (subject to verification of eligibility and compliance with the Sweepstakes rules) may be announced publicly by Sponsor on The Normal Brand social media. Sponsor will notify each winner by a means set out on the Sweepstakes Description Page of a Sweepstakes with five (5) business days after the time and date listed on the Sweepstakes Description Page (the “Winner Notification”). A winner must respond to the Winner Notification within 48 hours of receipt of the Winner Notification and, in order to be eligible to accept a prize, must include in such response all required information which may include: (i) winner’s full legal name, (ii) current residential mailing address, (iii) phone number, and (iv) date of birth. If a winner fails to respond to the Winner Notification in the time and in the manner required, or if a Winner Notification is returned as undeliverable, such Winner will be disqualified and will be deemed to have forfeited his/her prize without compensation of any kind. Sponsor shall have no liability for a winner's failure to receive notices due to winners' spam, junk e-mail or other security settings, winners’ failure to follow/like the The Normal Brand social media page, or for winners' provision of incorrect or otherwise non-functioning contact information. It is the sole responsibility of an entrant to notify Sponsor of any changes in his/her name and/or address (or other contact information). Each winning entrant must sign and return any documents, if requested, within the time period stipulated by the Sponsor. Failure to comply with this requirement may result in disqualification and prize forfeiture without compensation of any kind. Any notification returned as undeliverable may result in disqualification and the prize may be awarded to another entrant. In the event a winning entry is discovered to be invalid for any other reason whatsoever, the prize may be forfeited and awarded to an alternate winner. For any legally required prize winner list, or for an additional copy of these Official Rules, email Sponsor at thebear@thenormalbrand.com by the deadline set forth on the Sweepstakes Description Page. Please specify “Name of Winner” or “Rules” (as applicable) in the subject line of your email.

TAXES AND EXPENSES: Winners are solely responsible for all federal, state, and local taxes and all other fees and expenses associated with prize acceptance and use not specified in these Official Rules or on the Sweepstakes Description Page as being awarded. Winners of prizes valued at $600 or more will be issued an IRS 1099 Tax Form reflecting the actual value of the prize; and, such winners agree to execute and return an IRS W9 Tax Form and otherwise fully cooperate with Sponsor in conjunction with reporting his/her receipt of such prize to the Internal Revenue Service as required by law.

RELEASE BY ENTRANTS; DISPUTES: By entering the Sweepstakes, each entrant indemnifies, releases and agrees to hold harmless Sponsor and its parents, subsidiaries, affiliates, owners, employees, partners and any social media platform used in connection with the Sweepstakes from any liability whatsoever for any claims, costs, losses, or damages of any kind (including, but not limited to, consequential or punitive damages, those related to, personal injury, death, damage to property, infringement of proprietary rights, rights of publicity, or privacy or defamation, and attorney fees) arising out of or in connection with: (1) entering a Sweepstakes; (2) technological, programming, computer, network, electronic, social media platform malfunctions/errors/failures which corrupt or interfere with the intended conduct of any Sweepstakes, including but not limited to such malfunctions/errors/failures which result in lost, late, damaged, garbled, corrupted, incomplete, inaccessible or otherwise comprised entry submissions regardless of cause; (3) acceptance or use/misuse of any prize; or (4) any other act or omission arising out of or relating to the Sweepstakes.

MISCONDUCT: Sponsor reserves the right at its sole discretion to disqualify or refuse entry to any person who (i) tampers with the registration process, the operation of a Sweepstakes or a Sponsor web site; (ii) acts in an unsportsmanlike or disruptive manner, or with the intent to annoy or harass another person; or (iii) is otherwise in violation of these Official Rules. Entries generated by a script, macro, or other automated means and entry by any means which subvert the entry process will be void. Sponsor reserves the right, in its sole discretion, to disqualify from the Sweepstakes and ban from any future Sweepstakes, any person it believes has intentionally violated these Official Rules, or to be acting in an unsportsmanlike or disruptive manner, or to have tampered with any element of the Sweepstakes without notice to the disqualified or banned person. Sponsor will interpret these rules and resolve any disputes, conflicting claims or ambiguities concerning the rules or the Sweepstakes and Sponsor’s decisions concerning such disputes shall be final. If the conduct or outcome of the Sweepstakes is affected by human error, any mechanical malfunctions or failures of any kind, intentional interference or any event beyond the control of Sponsor (including but not limited to natural disaster, epidemic/pandemic, civil commotion, riot or strike), Sponsor reserves the right to terminate this Sweepstakes, or make such other decisions regarding the outcome as Sponsor deems appropriate in its sole discretion. In such event, Sponsor shall endeavor to make all prizes and discounts available in a manner which is fair, appropriate and consistent with these Official Rules, to the extent feasible. In no event, however, will more than the stated quantity of prizes be awarded. Sponsor may waive any of these rules in its sole discretion. Sponsor’s failure to enforce any of these rules on a given occasion shall not constitute a waiver of such rule. Any attempt by an entrant to deliberately damage any web site or undermine the operation of the sweepstakes may be a violation of criminal and civil laws and should such an attempt be made, Sponsor reserves the right to seek damages from any such person to the fullest extent permitted by law. The use of robotic, automatic, macro, programmed, or like methods for participation in this Sweepstakes is strictly prohibited and all such entries will be void. In the event of a dispute, entry will be deemed to be made by the authorized owner of the email account used to enter the Sweepstakes, associated with social media account used to enter the Sweepstakes or otherwise associated with Sweepstakes entry. The authorized owner is the natural person assigned to an email address by an Internet access provider, on-line service provider, or other organization responsible for assigning the email address.

SOCIAL MEDIA GIVEAWAY TERMS & CONDITIONS

For the purposes of these Terms and Conditions, "The Sponsor" refers to The Normal Brand whose Instagram handle is @thenormalbrand. The "Prize" refers to the prize specified in the giveaway.

By entering the competition you agree to be bound by these terms and conditions. All entries must be received by the time and date specified. Winner(s) will be selected at random by The Sponsor by the following business day and the winner will be notified on or after this date.

The Sponsors competitions with entry via Instagram and/or Facebook are open only to residents of The United States. Unless specified, one (1) winner will be chosen at random from all entrants and across all platforms.

No purchase necessary. Winners will not be required to pay to enter the competition.

Entrants must be over 18 years old on the date of their entry.

Employees of The Sponsor are not eligible to enter.

Instagram or Facebook are not in any way affiliated or involved in the competition.

Hotel Jerome is not a sponsor of the competition.

Only one entry per person per competition will be accepted.

The Sponsor will not be held liable for any failure of receipt of entries. The Sponsor takes no responsibility for any entries which are lost, delayed, illegible, corrupted, damaged, incomplete or otherwise invalid.

To the extent permitted by applicable law, The Sponsor’s liability under or in connection with the competition or these terms and conditions shall be limited to the cost price of the Prize in question.

To the extent permitted by applicable law, The Sponsor shall not be liable under or in connection with these terms and conditions, the competition or any Prize for any indirect, special or consequential cost, expense, loss or damage suffered by a participant even if such cost, expense, loss or damage was reasonably foreseeable or might reasonably have been contemplated by the participant and the Sponsor and whether arising from breach of contract, tort, negligence, breach of statutory duty or otherwise.

Prizes are non-negotiable, non-transferable and non-refundable. No cash alternative is available. Where a Prize becomes unavailable for any reason, the Sponsor reserves the right to substitute that prize for a prize of equal or higher value.

The name, address, email address and phone number of the winner must be provided to The Sponsor if requested and will be shared to enable fulfillment of the Prize.​

In the event of unforeseen circumstances beyond The Sponsor’s reasonable control, the Sponsor reserves the right to cancel, terminate, modify or suspend the competition or these terms and conditions, either in whole or in part, with or without notice.

The Sponsor's decision is final. No correspondence will be entered into.

The winner’s name and social media username may be posted on the social media profiles of The Sponsor after the winner has been selected.

PRIVACY POLICY: By entering the Sweepstakes you agree to receive email newsletters periodically from Sponsor. Entry and related information collected by Sponsor in connection with the Sweepstakes is governed by Sponsor’s official Privacy Policy, which can be viewed at https://thenormalbrand.com/apps/enzuzo/privacy

SPONSOR: The Sponsor of the Sweepstakes is The Normal Brand, a Missouri corporation, headquartered at 111 W Port Plaza Dr, Suite 700, St. Louis, MO 63146, United States.
